query:
SELECT
                  users.username AS "user_name!",
                  users.email "user_email",
                  inviter.username AS "inviter_name!",
                  project.name AS "project_name!"
                FROM users
                INNER JOIN users inviter ON inviter.id = $1
                INNER JOIN mods project ON project.id = $2
                WHERE users.id = $3
